PERFECT FAMILY LIVING IN COURTENAY ***GRAND OPEN FOR INSPECTION SAT 30/05 @ 11.00am***
CRANBOURNE NORTH - COURTENAY GARDENS: Set on a block of approximately 530sqms, this unique home has a distinct country feel due to its location close to a parkland. With plenty of essential amenities within close proximity, it's ideal for either a growing family, a first home buyer or even an investor looking to add value/variety to their portfolio.
This home offers 4 bedrooms - located at the very rear of the house offering the peace and quiet one would desire, is the very spacious master bedroom which includes an ensuite, a walk-in robe and an alcove/retreat giving you the ultimate opportunity to unwind in privacy at the end of the day. The other three bedrooms, all with built-in robes, are located to the right of the home. They are well serviced by the centrally located family bathroom and toilet which can also act as a semi-ensuite to bedroom 1 at the very front of the home with a shared door between the two.
As you walk through the grand entrance of this home you are greeted by the formal lounge to the left, which then leads you into the open plan dining and kitchen which is loaded with features. Plenty of storage, walk-in pantry, quality kitchen appliances, dishwasher etc to name a few. The second family living area is large and spacious enough to accommodate the whole family after a long day.
If entertaining is your forte then you've got plenty of options with access to the paved/ enclosed pergola through the family dining area and also an open pergola which is accessible through the family room. There is also a large reserve adjacent to the property, with a lockable gate allowing direct access from the garden - perfect for family picnics, room for the kids to play or for getting some exercise.
